page.title: 15Clubs (sheet 1)
page.content: The Brownies,Guides,Cubs and Scouts are all clubs of some kind.The Brownies are for young girls and the Guides are for elder girls,the Cubs are for young boys and the Scouts are for elder boys.When you are seven you can start Brownies and Cubs. You can start Guides and Scouts when you are ten.You stay at Guides until you are fourteen and then you become a young Guider.There is a group of each at Blackmoor. There is another kind of club in our area. It is called Whitehill Club. It has a place for children to play in and the rest is for the bar where the adults stay. There are two bars one for adults and one for children. At the children's bar they sell lemonade and coke and crisps. by Michelle Mattocks and Maria Long.
